name: DuckVenture (LironHero)
description:
A game about some duck running around to get those pretty gems!
Similar jump mechanic to Mario 64

You can glide!! Because ducks don't really fly. :)

Here's my Twitter: @Lironhero

This is the first game I made. Since I'm not well familiarized with programming, the game has some wonky physics, definitely not the movement I would've wished for, but it's a start. I hope you like it!

Love from Brazil. <3
